intro_only_event_3th_anniversary_login/6:
Everyone on Pasio sure seems excited for
the festival.

Yeah, it looks like Lear is putting a lot of effort
into it!

You’re right. I’ve also begun to notice lots of new
Trainers in town.
That’s great and all, but that guy Lear...

Don’t you think he’s using our names a bit too
much to promote Pasio?
Hahaha! I don’t see anything wrong with it!

It’s all part of being a Champion! Plus, this way
we’re more likely to battle strong opponents!
But I’m a former Champion!

I think it’s great that our names can draw so
many people to Pasio.
Fair point. I guess I’ll just enjoy myself!
Look! Look! It’s the Pasio festival!
Indeed. The city is lively, too!

It’s so heartwarming to see people and Pokémon
come together in celebration.

Yes. When everyone around you is having fun,
you can’t help but feel happy, too.
What are you smiling about, Cynthia?
Hm? Oh, nothing in particular...

Seeing everyone around town in such high spirits
has me a bit excited for what’s coming.

With all these new people and Pokémon, I wonder
what sorts of Pokémon battles await us!
I’m looking forward to it, too!
I hope we can have lots of Pokémon battles!
*chuckle* I expected as much from you two.
What should we do with newfound power?

As long as we live, this will remain a question
that we must seek the answer to...even if there is
no answer.

A festival, huh? That gets our Alolan blood
pumping, doesn’t it, Hau?
Yeah! We’re all gonna have so much fun!

In that case, as a representative from Galar,
I’ll have to keep up!

During the Gym Challenge in the Galar region,
everyone gets pumped up, just like with any
other festival!

The Galar region’s Gym Challenge? I’d love to
experience it in person!
Me too! I really wanna give Gym battles a try!

I want the real deal—not just Alola’s imitation
Gym in Malie City!
Alola’s imitation Gym?

Yeah! There’s a tourist attraction in Alola called
the Kantonian Gym, where people in Alola can
experience Gym battles!
Wow! To think such a place exists!
I guess I still have a lot of studying to do!

Studying is fine, but for now, let’s enjoy the
festival together!
